div.p: This code system http://tecnomod-um.org/CodeSystem/stroke-circumstance-codes-cs defines the following codes:

tr.td: Indicates that the stroke occurred while the patient was already admitted to the hospital for another reason.
Indicates that the stroke symptoms were first noticed upon waking from sleep, with an unknown time of onset.

description.value: Codes for findings related to the circumstances of stroke onset (In-hospital, Wake-up).

definition.value: Indicates that the stroke occurred while the patient was already admitted to the hospital for another reason.
Indicates that the stroke symptoms were first noticed upon waking from sleep, with an unknown time of onset.
